law.text: In order to satisfy the requirements for licensure, a long-term care facility shall establish daily visiting hours which, at a minimum, shall consist of six (6) hours between 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. and two (2) hours between 5 p.m. and 8 p.m.
law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 157, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1982.
